reasoning.correctness: The Generated Answer is factually accurate in the symptoms it lists (loss of taste [P-4], fever [P-4], weakness [P-2], decreased appetite [P-2, P-4], headaches [P-11, P-12], muscle aches [P-20 via D-36], sore throat [P-9 via D-36], cough [P-7 via D-36]), all verifiable from patient reports. summary: The Generated Answer is highly faithful and relevant, with strong correctness and completeness, but minor issues include missing smell loss and runny nose denial, plus extraneous breathing description.
